briefTitle: A Study Assessing Saxagliptin Treatment in Type 2 Diabetic Subjects Who Are Not Controlled With TZD Therapy Alone

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Type 2 diabetics currently receiving a stable dose of TZD monotherapy (pioglitazone 30mg or 45mg, or rosiglitazone 4mg or 8mg) for at least 12 weeks prior to screening.
* Hemoglobin A1c (HbA1c) \> = 7.0% and \< = 10.5%
* Body mass index \< = 45kg/m2
* Fasting C-peptide \> = 1 ng/mL

Exclusion Criteria:

* Symptomatic poorly controlled diabetes
* Recent cardiac or cerebrovascular event
* Serum creatinine \> = 2.0 mg/dL

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Hemoglobin A1c (A1C) at Week 24
outcomeMeasures.description: Mean change from baseline in A1C at Week 24, adjusted for baseline value.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Fasting Plasma Glucose (FPG) at Week 24
outcomeMeasures.description: Mean change from baseline in FPG at Week 24, adjusted for baseline value.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants Achieving A1c <7% at Week 24
outcomeMeasures.description: Percentage of participants achieving A1C \< 7%, the American Diabetic Association's defined goal for glycemia, at each dose of saxagliptin plus TZD versus placebo plus TZD at Week 24.

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes From Baseline in Postprandial Glucose (PPG) Area Under the Curve (AUC) Response to an Oral Glucose Tolerance Test (OGTT) at Week 24
outcomeMeasures.description: Mean change from baseline for 0 to 180 minutes PPG AUC achieved at each dose of saxagliptin plus TZD versus placebo plus TZD at Week 24, adjusted for baseline value.
